usage.cn: 悲伤的结束便是智慧的开始。
usage.eng: The ending of sorrow is the beginning of wisdom.

usage.cn: 所有的结局都是新的开始，只是当时不知道。-Mitch Albom
usage.eng: All endings are beginnings, we just don't know it at the time.

usage.cn: 所有的故事，都有一个结局。但幸运的是，在生活中，每个结局都会变成一个新的开始。
usage.eng: Every story has an ending. But in life, every ending is a new beginning.

usage.cn: 最终背叛你的朋友，其实一开始就不是你的朋友。
usage.eng: A friend who betray you in the end, is never your friend from the beginning.
